import React, { useState } from 'react' import { ExpandCircleDown } from '@mui/icons-material' import './inputcomponent.css' const Inputcomponent = ({ title, inputName, inputHandler }) => { const [isOpenSpecialInputBox, setIsOpenSpcecialInputBox] = useState(false) return (
setIsOpenSpcecialInputBox(!isOpenSpecialInputBox)}> {title}
{isOpenSpecialInputBox &&
Name
Phone Number
}
) } export default Inputcomponent
